headline: How Recent Developments Are Shaping the Aon Investment Story
summary: Aon stock recently saw a modest reduction in its consensus fair value price target, now set at $402.67, down from $407.78. This adjustment follows a period of mixed analysis. Some market observers are encouraged by new growth avenues, while others remain cautious about immediate upside potential. Stay tuned to discover how to track these shifts and keep up with the evolving narrative on Aon's prospects. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Aon shifts by adding it to your watchlist or portfolio...

headline: UBS Maintains Neutral Stance on AON Despite Solid Earnings Growth
summary: Aon plc (NYSE:AON) is included among the 12 Best European Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. UBS analyst Brian Meredith cut the price target on Aon plc (NYSE:AON) to $390 from $400 on November 10 and maintained a Neutral stance on the stock, according to a report by The Fly. In the third quarter of 2025, Aon […]
